name: Mexican Salmon
author: Anonymous
summary: Salmon steaks are marinated in a tangy lime juice mixture, broiled, and served with lettuce, tomatoes, green onions and lime wedges. This recipe is great on the grill, too!
ingredients: 2  marinated roasted red peppers, with liquid
1 large tomato, cut into thin wedges
directions: In a medium nonreactive bowl, mix olive oil, juice of 2 limes, roasted red peppers, garlic, allspice, cinnamon, cumin, sugar, salt and pepper
Place salmon steaks in bowl, and rub with the mixture
Cover, and marinate in the refrigerator at least 1 hour
Arrange salmon steaks on a medium broiler pan, and broil 3 to 5 minutes on each side, until flesh is easily flaked with a fork
Mix tomato wedges and green onions in a small bowl
Serve salmon with the tomato mixture and lettuce
